TEXT.TITLE: <MICROTEL> TO LOWER LONG DISTANCE RATES
TEXT.BODY: Microtel, a fiber optic long distance company, said it plans to lower rates for interstate one plus dialing by 4.8 pct and LaserPLUS WATS service by 7.4 pct, effective July 15. Reuter
